response.overview: Protean is an exercise in observing the relationship between rhythm, patterns, space and sound. Animation as a primary medium allows me to play with patterns within movements and still images, while the sound and sculptural elements expand the visuals into physical space. However, once stripped of these technical aspects Protean intent is to consume the audience with the poetical notion of fleeing moments, possibility of multiverse and oneâ€™s mortality. This excerpt is a single channel version of a five channel installation.
response.title: Protean
